actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide certain authority respecting the sale of certain wild horses and burros on public lands pursuant to contracts providing for humane care treatment.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior and the Secretary of Agriculture to enter into contracts for the sale of certain free-roaming wild horses and burros on public lands. Stipulates that such contracts shall contain covenants requiring such animals to receive humane care and treatment.

titles.title: A bill to provide certain authority respecting the sale of certain wild horses and burros on public lands pursuant to contracts providing for humane care treatment.
